channel.title: Worst problem need help asap
channel.description:
So I'm having trouble with my client connecting to my source, I know this sounds stupid but trust me I'm a experienced coder. And idk what's going on. Please message me on skype for more information. It's a js5 connect error. I had someone message me already saying he could fix it. And I explained what all the other people have said when trying to help me and he said OH. You're using rune evo v3 right, i said yes. He asked what client I said foxtrot. he said that should work, then a few moments later he said oh, i got it. then I looked on my source cmd, and surely enough he had been connecting to me. and he was logged in and had fixed it only problem is he wants me to buy him a years of runescape membership for correcting the problem.. He also said I wouldn't find ANYONE else who could fix it.
Please help.. I can pay but minimum is like $30

item.title: Worst problem need help asap
item.dc:creator: @Tim5698 Tim5698
item.description:
@Tim5698 wrote:

I should had mentioned, I’m a pretty decent programmer. And I’ve done all the basic stuff you normally would need to do to make it run. But I can’t find the problem anywhere. Even in Eclipse. I’ll probably need remote help from someone more advanced than myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Worst problem need help asap
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

be sure to have portfowarded and if you want to test the source then change the ip to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Worst problem need help asap
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

are you running the server before you run the client?

Read full topic

item.title: Worst problem need help asap
item.dc:creator: @Tim5698 Tim5698
item.description:
@Tim5698 wrote:

yeah maximum. trust me I’ve changed ip…

Read full topic

item.title: Worst problem need help asap
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

We don’t really need a payment. Besides, it’s not allowed. And what? Minimum is 30? I hope you mean maximum

The error js5 connect error is 99.999999999% because you cannot connect to the server from your client (connecting to wrong ip)

If you can’t connect through your direct IP (external ip) try using “localhost” or "127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Worst problem need help asap
item.dc:creator: @Tim5698 Tim5698
item.description:
@Tim5698 wrote:

So I’m having trouble with my client connecting to my source, I know this sounds stupid but trust me I’m a experienced coder. And idk what’s going on.
Please message me on skype for more information. It’s a js5 connect error. I had someone message me already saying he could fix it.
And I explained what all the other people have said when trying to help me and he said OH. You’re using rune evo v3 right, i said yes. He asked what client I said foxtrot.
he said that should work, then a few moments later he said oh, i got it. then I looked on my source cmd, and surely enough he had been connecting to me. and he was logged in and had fixed it only problem is he wants me to buy him a years of runescape membership for correcting the problem… He also said I wouldn’t find ANYONE else who could fix it.

Please help… I can pay but minimum is like $30

Read full topic
